title: The Adventure Zone: Commitment - Episode 2
description: Our heroes are empowered by a somewhat gross and dangerous scientific process, and are dispatched on their first mission. Remy tries to keep the peace. Nadiya picks her favorite movie. Kardala breaks free.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
